channel.title: Version 6.1 :: Hugo Relearn Theme
channel.description: 6.1.1 (2024-08-02) Fixes [bug] link: link resolving stopped working in certain configurations #882 6.1.0 (2024-08-02) Enhancements [feature][change] assetbuster: use asset buster for all resources #875 [feature] theme: sync to Hugo changes for PublishDate #872 [feature] theme: allow errorlevel override on page level #870 [feature] relref: provide shortcodes to lift certain restrictions #864 [feature] openapi: adjust to Hugo’s build-in link render hook #860 [feature][change] include: adjust to Hugo’s build-in link render hook #859 Fixes [bug] variant: auto variant references potentially wrong chroma style #873 [bug] schema: sync to Hugo changes for LanguageCode #866 [bug] taxonomy: simplify code #852 [bug] alias: index.html has displays error in content #851 Maintenance [task] icon: update Font Awesome to 6.6.0 #881 [task] math: update MathJax to 3.2.2 #880 [task] openapi: update swagger-ui to 5.17.14 #879 [task] mermaid: update to 10.9.1 #878 [task] theme: remove special cases for LanguageCode #861 [task] link: adjust to Hugo’s build-in code #858 [task] image: adjust to Hugo’s build-in code #857 [task] opengraph: sync to Hugo’s implementation #856 [task] i18n: improve file naming #848
